name: crossed  rib  hat
notes:
this pretty knit-look crochet ribbed hat is featuring an interesting 3d ribbing, a folded brim and a shaped top with no bunching.  

the hat is first worked sideways in rows as a flat piece using an easy 2 rows repeat pattern!

a video tutorial is included!
